delete_row_dependent_text: This data record is linked in the following tables. The links will be removed.
no_dependent_text: Data record is not linked anywhere.
error_saving_cell: The cell could not be saved. Refresh your browser now?
show_dependency_text: This data record is linked in one table.
show_dependency_text_plural: This data record is linked in {{count}} tables.

final.unlock_toast:
This row has been marked as final.
Click again to unlock for this session.
final.set_all_rows_final: Set the whole table as final

translations.dialog_question:
You modified content which had already been translated. Would you like to inform other languages' translators?
Choose "no" if you just fixed a mistake.

jump.no_such_column: No column with ID {{col}} in this table

editor.sanity_info: Please make sure the title describes the purpose properly

jumpspinner.title: Hold on, we bring you there!
jumpspinner.subtitle: Waiting for more data.

copy_links_error: Can only copy and paste links from the same column.
copy_kind_error: Can not paste the copied value here.

confirm_copy.header: Proceed pasting multi language cell contents?
confirm_copy.info: You copied a multi language cell. By pasting you will overwrite all existing values in the respective languages like this:
